Question: Euri Company CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Euri Company

Product: C Seed N1 Foldable TV

- 137-inch foldable TV showcased at CES 2024
- Custom-built with a seamless, bright picture
- Screen can rotate 180 degrees and folds up into a compact rectangular chunk
- Priced at $200,000 including installation and setup
Summary_cn:
欧瑞公司

产品：C Seed N1 可折叠电视

- 在2024年的CES展会上展示的137英寸可折叠电视
- 定制，拥有无缝、亮丽的画面
- 屏幕可以旋转180度，并能折叠成一个紧凑的矩形块
- 售价20万美元，包括安装和设置费用
